physDesc.p: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 30 x 73, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (2) 43 x 36, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 38 x 39, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, right margin (?), (4) 30 x 43, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 23 x 32, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (6) 26 x 46, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 30 x 8, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 27 x 16, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 22 x 29, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 23 x 25, (A) 1 line, top margin (?), (B) blank, (11) 83 x 22, (A) 5 lines, top bottom margin, (B) blank, (12) 68 x 22, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (13) 87 x 18, (A) 10 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (14) 66 x 53, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 5 lines, top margin, (15) 52 x 59, (A) 9 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank
